channel.title: ExtinctionX -Dung-Turmoil-Perfect Pking- 1# Server- MOD SPOTS OPEN -
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/0nsrK.png[/center][/img][/center]
Welcome to our development page,This server has been in development for 4 mounts now, lots of hard work has been put in, and its time to release it,
Objectives to do before release
[center]0% DONE 25% DONE 50% DONE 75% DONE 100% DONE
-Buy VPS- -Buy Domain- -Pre Design Website- [/center]
Let me start of by introducing the team and letting you know our goals
[center]The Team/Staff/Developers[/center]
Owner - Goran Web Developers - Goran + erashurgal Moderators - sm3nnz-Zfox Server Developers and client - Goran/More needed
[center][size=18pt]Our Goals - [/size]
-Fading Hitmarks -Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses. -Combat Icons Next to Damage -Dungeoneering FLAWLESS (8 GOOD Floors) We based it on insidiaXs -All Important Summoning Special Attacks -Player Owned Shops -We added Nomad although he isnt agressive ;p -New Pk locations -Elite Slayer Tasks Took ages to figure out :P -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -90% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -39 Jad Waves, Custom -Advanced Dicing System -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Vote4Cash Integrated -Make a webclient -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits with the hitsplash -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading (Was very slow with base) -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -317 Classic RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters FUNPK Area -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding) -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow -Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring -Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server! -Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild) -Real RS Barrage Orb's for non freezing barrages. -Fixed ALL Mem Leaks -Enabled Dupeless Stakeing -100% Server Stability -HUGE WEBSITE SHOP! 100+ ITEMS
-653 Items -Real RS Korasi Gfx & Anim -No Custom Items Added -Add new interface/gameframe -Add MoneyPouch -Fix Bank all dc error -Add more Dung items -Fix and find duel bug (not many)[/center]
[size=36pt][center]Pictures[/center][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/F7VBX.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/3BUYo.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/Z3ABv.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/Q2gD5.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/8s8pb.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PLnEq.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mm1SR.png[/img][img]http://i.imgur.com/TF3c9.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pdos3.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aKnF7.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8QnVi.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iZvr2.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rfpbc.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1C6DY.png[/img]
[center]Requirements to become a programmer or join the team.
Programmers -Know what your doing -at least 2 years experience -knows how to programm -knows how to overcome problems
Mod -Active on fourms
Post one of these below if intrested in joining also skype is required to join the team no MSN,
You will need to prove to me you know what your doing so be prepared for a interview,
POST SKYPE BELOW[/center]

@ExtinctionX wrote:

I dont understand why people think its a leach, nothing on this topic is close to a leach, all has been made by the team, only thing thats copied is the dungeering,Copied from insidiax , if i can admit we copied that why wouldnt i admit the rest?
Trolls

item.title: ExtinctionX -Dung-Turmoil-Perfect Pking- 1# Server- MOD SPOTS OPEN -
item.dc:creator: @ExtinctionX ExtinctionX
item.description:
@ExtinctionX wrote:

[center][/center]

Welcome to our development page,This server has been in development for 4 mounts now, lots of hard work has been put in, and its time to release it,

Objectives to do before release

[center]0% DONE
25% DONE
50% DONE
75% DONE
100% DONE

-Buy VPS-
-Buy Domain-
-Pre Design Website-
[/center]

Let me start of by introducing the team and letting you know our goals

[center]The Team/Staff/Developers[/center]

Owner - Goran
Web Developers - Goran + erashurgal
Moderators - sm3nnz-Zfox
Server Developers and client - Goran/More needed

[center][size=18pt]Our Goals - [/size]

-Fading Hitmarks
-Added Working Leech Spec and ALL Saps Curses.
-Combat Icons Next to Damage
-Dungeoneering FLAWLESS (8 GOOD Floors) We based it on insidiaXs
-All Important Summoning Special Attacks
-Player Owned Shops
-We added Nomad although he isnt agressive ;p
-New Pk locations
-Elite Slayer Tasks Took ages to figure out
-More Advanaced Skilling than PI
-FULLY working Overloads 100% RS
-Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging!
-100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)!
-PKP Shops
-90% Corrected Item Stats
-Even More NPC Anims Added
-39 Jad Waves, Custom
-Advanced Dicing System
-Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded
-PERFECT Bridding / Switching
-Vote4Cash Integrated
-Make a webclient
-Soulwars Cape & More Items Added
-Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect’s)
-Critical Hits with the hitsplash
-Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated
-Instant Loading (Was very slow with base)
-Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects
-Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces
-317 Classic RS Graphics
-Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces
-NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE
-Working Spirit Shield Effects
-Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects
-Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields
-NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED
-602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters
-Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother!
-Donaters FUNPK Area
-Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding)
-Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP
-Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server
-Near Flawless Combat System
-Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow
-Real RS Dung Teleport /w Kinship Ring
-Dungeoneering is by far the most advanced from ANY server!
-Working and Completely Custom PK Skill (exp from winning in wild)
-Real RS Barrage Orb’s for non freezing barrages.
-Fixed ALL Mem Leaks
-Enabled Dupeless Stakeing
-100% Server Stability
-HUGE WEBSITE SHOP! 100+ ITEMS

-653 Items
-Real RS Korasi Gfx & Anim
-No Custom Items Added
-Add new interface/gameframe
-Add MoneyPouch
-Fix Bank all dc error
-Add more Dung items
-Fix and find duel bug (not many)[/center]

[size=36pt][center]Pictures[/center][/size]

pdos3.png770×503
rfpbc.png765×506

[center]Requirements to become a programmer or join the team.

Programmers
-Know what your doing
-at least 2 years experience
-knows how to programm
-knows how to overcome problems

Mod
-Active on fourms

Post one of these below if intrested in joining
also skype is required to join the team no MSN,

You will need to prove to me you know what your doing so be prepared for a interview,

POST SKYPE BELOW[/center]

Read full topic
